text: The following lists events that happened in 1947 in Iceland. ==Incumbents== *President - Sveinn Björnsson *Prime Minister - Ólafur Thors, Stefán Jóhann Stefánsson ==Events== ==Births== Halldór Ásgrímsson, Prime Minister 2004-2006 *20 February - Eggert Magnússon, businessman *4 March - Gunnar Hansen, actor (d. 2015) *29 June - Ágúst Guðmundsson, film director and screenwriter *24 August - Ólafur Haukur Símonarson, novelist and playwright *8 September - Halldór Ásgrímsson, politician (d. 2015) *25 September - Guðmundur Sigurjónsson, chess grandmaster *26 October - Gísli Guðjónsson, professor of forensic psychology *31 October - Gunnsteinn Skúlason, handball player. ==Deaths== *12 September - Thor Philip Axel Jensen, Danish entrepreneur who settled in Iceland (b. 1863) ==References== Category:1940s in Iceland Iceland Iceland Category:Years of the 20th century in Iceland
title: 1947 in Iceland
